comment: Dear @HighPope_Brun . 1st DrOz is a cardiac surgeon, not a virologist, not an epidemiologist. So he's not an expert or a specialist.2nd He express the worldwide conservative view, economy is above human life (old story eg Dickens). So he isn't alone.
